name: Super Mario World: The Secret of the 7 Golden Statues
storyline: Mario and Luigi were heading back to Peach’s Castle after another one of their amazing adventures, however as soon as they walk in, Peach sends them out on another mission to collect the 7 Golden Statues which Bowser had stolen from her not long ago. Where did they come from? And what’s so bad about Bowser stealing some statues?
summary: Super Mario World: The Secret of the 7 Golden Statues is a rom hack of Super Mario World. It features a few new animations, ground pounding, new power-ups, custom music and much more.
